column3: Traffic;Sihanoukville: A car accident killed one and injures three others in front of the provincial tax office at around 7am on 5 July 2020.------According to witnesses at the scene
column4: the car that the victim was in a tourist bus for Preah Sihanouk province that was stopping on the sidewalk to get luggage from the back.------A Chinese driver was driving an Alphard at high speeds and crashed into the back of the car
column5: leaving three men and a woman inside with some injuries. The man later died on the way to an emergency hospital in Phnom Penh.------The injured victims were taken to a hospital
column6: while police officers intervened and detained the Chinese driver. ------SNTV------*The victim has not been identified
column7: but is presumed to be a the bus driver.
